org.teatrove.trove.file
Interface FileBuffer

All Known Subinterfaces:
DataFileBuffer, TxFileBuffer
All Known Implementing Classes:
NonTxFileBuffer, RandomAccessFileBuffer, ReadOnlyFileBuffer, SystemFileBuffer, TaggedTxFileBuffer
public interface FileBuffer

Interface for accessing and modifying the contents of a file. When a lock is requested on a FileBuffer, a stronger one may be acquired, if the FileBuffer doesn't support the type requested.

Author:
Brian S O'Neill
